{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.21349v1", "title": "Gorenstein homological modules over tensor rings", "summary": "For a tensor ring $T_R(M)$, under certain conditions, we characterize the
Gorenstein projective modules over $T_R(M)$, and prove that a $T_R(M)$-module
$(X,u)$ is Gorenstein projective if and only if $u$ is monomorphic and ${\rm
coker}(u)$ is a Gorenstein projective $R$-module. Gorenstein injective (resp.,
flat) modules over $T_R(M)$ are also explicitly described. Moreover, we give a
characterization for the coherence of $T_R(M)$. Some applications to trivial
ring extensions and Morita context rings are given.", "main_category": "math.RA", "categories": "math.RA,math.KT", "published": "2025-04-30T06:17:14Z"}
